verses.verse: Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G3097>Wise-men<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, saying,

Where <S%G4226><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5088>born<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5015>it<s%>, he was troubled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4863>gathering<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%>, he <S%G4441>inquired<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should be <S%G1080>born<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah<s%>, <S%G1488>art<s%> in <S%G3760>no<s%> wise <S%G1646>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2232>princes<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2448>Judah<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> shall <S%G1831>come<s%> forth a <S%G2233>governor<s%>, who shall be <S%G4165>shepherd<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2977>privily<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G3097>Wise-men<s%>, and <S%G198>learned<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G198>exactly<s%> what <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G1833>search<s%> out <S%G4012>exactly<s%> <S%G199>concerning<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1875>when<s%> ye have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G518>him<s%>, bring <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G518>word<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G191>they<s%>, having heard the <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G4198>went<s%> their <S%G2532>way<s%>; and <S%G2400>lo<s%>, the <S%G792>star<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%>, went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2193>till<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>.
And <S%G1161>when<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%>, they <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> with <S%G4970>exceeding<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G2147>saw<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> opening <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> they <S%G4374>offered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%>, <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3030>frankincense<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4666>myrrh<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> being warned of <S%G5537>God<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> that they <S%G344>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, they <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>.

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G402>departed<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeareth<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1453>Arise<s%> and <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G2468>thou<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%> and <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5054>death<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> did I <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2373>was<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G3097>Wise-men<s%>, <S%G2373>was<s%> <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G2373>wroth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%>, and <S%G337>slew<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the male <S%G3816>children<s%> that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> two years <S%G1332>old<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2736>under<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had exactly <S%G198>learned<s%> of the <S%G3844>Wise-men<s%>.
Then <S%G5119><s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>through<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

A <S%G5456>voice<s%> was <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4471>Ramah<s%>, <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3602>mourning<s%>, <S%G4478>Rachel<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> for <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>; <S%G2532>And<s%> she <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3870>comforted<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5053>dead<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeareth<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, saying,

Arise <S%G1453><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they are <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%>'s <S%G5590>life<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%> and <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G745>Archelaus<s%> was <S%G936>reigning<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the room <S%G473>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, he was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> being warned of <S%G5537>God<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%>, he withdrew <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>parts<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>; <S%G3704>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3754>prophets<s%>, that he should be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3480>Nazarene<s%>.
